analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#22-182) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#92-98)

DITECHCOIN (/unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#185-320) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#306-320)

DITECHCOIN.transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#306-320) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- msg.sender.balance == minBalanceForAccounts

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#216:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/9/0x4040dfed08346b98336be48072d071f0805c3ae0.sol#231-232:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
